snippet.title: ✅  Johnny Depp 'threw champagne bottle at Amber' before 'dragging her by the hair'
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQju4Bo1Tjk9SzhHQDknWaw?sub_confirmation=1
✍   denies throwing a magnum of champagne at Amber Heard and dragging her by her hair during a fight on her birthday, the High Court heard today.  The Pirates Of The Caribbean actor, 57, is accused of getting angry when Heard, 34, confronted him about arriving late to her 30th birthday celebrations on April 22 2016 and leaving early.  Sasha Wass QC asked Depp if he picked up the large bottle of champagne and threw it at Heard - missing her - before pulling her to the floor by her hair and dragging her.  Depp is in the fourth day of his libel case against News Group Newspapers and giving testimony, and denies 14 separate egations of domestic violence against his ex-wife.   He said he missed the start of the party because he had some bad news about his finances and "may have" smoked some marijuana "to calm down".  Depp said Heard was very upset he was so late and "she became very upset, very angry".  The lawyer told him: "You took Amber's anger about you being late as criticism, and you do ...
💖 #JohnnyDepp, #AmberHeard
